title: 3 and Out - 3 for the $$$ Week 7 NFL Picks *Plus Pod Exclusive Bonus Pick*
itunes:title: 3 and Out - 3 for the $$$ Week 7 NFL Picks *Plus Pod Exclusive Bonus Pick*
description:
John runs his picks for the his top 3 Week 7 NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement on his picks, plus a podcast exclusive bonus pick!

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
